column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Best pizza on the planet.  Always get the buttercrust and it's always best in the restaurant out of the pan so it's crispier.  There are many locations now
column2: though usually consistency is not usually an issue.  If you take it to go and eat it out of the box
column3: just know it is even better out of the pan (or out of your oven - order it uncut and crisp it back up for 10 minutes).
